org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce

Interface MapContext<KEYIN,VALUEIN,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT>

  • Type Parameters:
    KEYIN - the key input type to the Mapper
    VALUEIN - the value input type to the Mapper
    KEYOUT - the key output type from the Mapper
    VALUEOUT - the value output type from the Mapper
    All Superinterfaces:
    JobContext, org.apache.hadoop.util.Progressable, TaskAttemptContext, TaskInputOutputContext<KEYIN,VALUEIN,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapContextImpl, Mapper.Context, WrappedMapper.Context

    public interface MapContext<KEYIN,VALUEIN,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT>
extends TaskInputOutputContext<KEYIN,VALUEIN,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT>
    The context that is given to the Mapper.
